item.title: Reduced Spoke Bicycles : Conceptual Bike
item.description:
Reduced Spoke Bicycles : Conceptual Bike

Conceptual Bike - Ion Lucin has simplified the design of a standard two-wheeler with his conceptual bike Baik that opts for three-spoked wheels, a limited use of lin...

item.title: Mido Eyewear Show 2016
item.description:
Mido Eyewear Show 2016

While you might not have heard of it, Italy's Mido Eyewear Show is the leading event for eyewear professionals. It's an exhibition during which major international brands present their new styles and innovations for prescription specs and sunglasses-and, while it might sound like it's purely for industry members, it's fascinating for anybody interested in fashion and design.

item.title: Brooklyn's Luft Coffee
item.description:
Brooklyn's Luft Coffee

About five years ago, Blair Smith's twice-a-day coffee pitstop at NYC's Kaffe 1668 led to him striking up a friendship with barista Justin Rodriguez behind the counter. Smith then met mobile developer Aaron Sutula in a coffee seminar held by an espresso machine company. "I took a day off of work to go," remembers Sutula.
